item.title: 中国希望与欧盟就电动汽车关税问题达成双方都能接受的解决方案
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国希望就计划对中国电动汽车征收关税一事与欧盟通过谈判达成双方都能接受的解决方案，以避免贸易摩擦升级。【原文：China hopes to reach mutually acceptable solutions through negotiation with the European Union on planned tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles to avoid escalation of trade friction, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 央行警告风险，中国资金仍流入债券市场
item.description: 中国国债期货周四跃升至新高，而长期收益率则徘徊在历史低点，原因是投资者继续将资金投入债券，摆脱了央行一再发出的风险警告。【原文：China's treasury futures leapt to fresh highs on Thursday, while long-dated yields skirted record lows, as investors continued to plough money into bonds, shrugging off repeated warnings about risk from the central bank.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国人主导俄罗斯电动汽车市场，Zeekr 销量大增
item.description: 去年，Zeekr 电动汽车在俄罗斯的销量激增，使中国汽车制造商在俄罗斯规模虽小但发展迅速的电动汽车（EV）行业中领先于当地竞争对手。【原文：Sales of Zeekr electric vehicles have shot up in Russia in the last year, putting Chinese carmakers ahead of local competition in Russia's small but rapidly expanding electric vehicle (EV) sector.】

item.title: 研究人员告诉欧洲央行，您可以继续降息
item.description: 两位研究人员将于下周向欧洲央行高层表示，欧洲央行在对抗通胀的斗争中面临着 "最后一公里的轻松"，可以继续缓慢降息。【原文：The European Central Bank faces an "easy last kilometre" in its fight against inflation and can continue to slowly cut interest rates, two researchers are set to tell the ECB's top brass next week.】

item.title: 诺基亚向法国政府出售海底网络业务 ASN
item.description: 诺基亚周四表示，已同意以 3.5 亿欧元（3.74 亿美元）的价格向法国政府出售其海底网络业务 ASN，但该交易不会影响其财务前景。【原文：Nokia on Thursday said it had agreed to sell its submarine networks business ASN to the French state for 350 million euros ($374 million), but that the deal would not impact its financial outlook.】

item.title: 报告称，2030-35 年间，全球碳清除市场规模将达到 1000 亿美元/年
item.description: 管理咨询公司奥利弗-怀曼（Oliver Wyman）周四发布的一份报告称，如果能解决二氧化碳（CO2）减排信用额度增长的障碍，2030年至2035年间，全球二氧化碳减排信用额度市场规模将从去年的27亿美元增至每年1000亿美元。【原文：The global market for carbon dioxide (CO2) removal credits could reach up to $100 billion a year between 2030 and 2035 from $2.7 billion last year if barriers to its growth are addressed, a report by management consultancy Oliver Wyman said on Thursday.】

item.title: 解说：你需要冷静：为什么泰勒-斯威夫特经济不是真的？
item.description: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）在欧洲掀起了一场风暴，促使一些学者设想，随着歌迷涌向从都柏林到维也纳等地的数十场售罄演出，欧洲将出现经济暴利。【原文：Taylor Swift is taking Europe by storm, prompting some pundits to envisage an economic windfall as fans flock to dozens of sold-out shows from Dublin to Vienna and beyond.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会就波音公司公布 737 MAX 9 调查细节一事对其进行制裁
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）周四早些时候表示，它将对波音公司进行制裁，因为波音公司披露了正在对1月5日阿拉斯加航空公司737 MAX 9空中紧急事件进行调查的非公开细节。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board said early Thursday it is sanctioning Boeing for disclosing non-public details of the ongoing investigation into the Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 mid-air emergency.】

item.title: H&M 第二季度业绩不及预期，六月份销售额下降
item.description: 全球第二大上市时装零售商 H&M 周四公布的 3-5 月份营业利润增幅低于预期，并表示 6 月份的销售额预计将下降，这使其全年盈利目标更难实现。【原文：H&M , the world's second-biggest listed fashion retailer, reported on Thursday a smaller-than-expected rise in March-May operating profit and said June sales were expected to fall, making its full-year earnings goal harder to achieve.】

item.title: 圣戈班同意以约 10 亿美元收购 FOSROC
item.description: 法国圣戈班公司周四表示，该公司已达成协议，将以约 9.6 亿欧元（10.3 亿美元）的价格收购总部位于迪拜的建筑化学品公司 FOSROC，以推动其国际扩张。【原文：France's Saint-Gobain has entered into an agreement to buy Dubai-based construction chemicals company FOSROC for around 960 million euros ($1.03 billion) to drive its international expansion, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 受芯片和美国需求影响，韩国出口将连续第九个月增长：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，韩国6月份的出口预计将连续第九个月增长，其中对美国的半导体销售将领衔增长，但由于日历效应，增长率可能会放缓。【原文：South Korea's exports are expected to have risen for a ninth consecutive month in June, with semiconductor sales to the U.S. leading the increase, although the growth rate likely slowed on calendar effects, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 聚焦：英国石油公司停止招聘，放慢可再生能源推广速度，以赢得投资者青睐
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）新任首席执行官穆雷-奥金克斯（Murray Auchincloss）表示，由于投资者对该公司的能源转型战略不满，他重新强调了石油和天然气的重要性，因此该公司已经冻结了招聘，并暂停了新的海上风电项目。【原文：BP's new CEO Murray Auchincloss has imposed a hiring freeze and paused new offshore wind projects as he places a renewed emphasis on oil and gas amid investor discontent over its energy transition strategy, sources at the company said.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，软银将以 30 亿美元的估值投资搜索初创公司 Perplexity AI
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，日本科技投资者软银集团公司的愿景基金2号（Vision Fund 2）将向美国搜索初创公司Perplexity AI投资1000万至2000万美元，估值30亿美元。【原文：Japanese technology investor SoftBank Group Corp's Vision Fund 2 is investing between $10 million and $20 million in U.S. search startup Perplexity AI at a valuation of $3 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲 通胀等待游戏令人担忧
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 印度 Infosys 公司与市场监管机构就内幕交易指控达成和解
item.description: 印度市场监管机构周四表示，印度第二大 IT 服务出口商 Infosys 公司首席执行官 Salil Parekh 已就违反内幕交易规定的指控达成和解。【原文：India's No.2 IT services exporter Infosys' CEO Salil Parekh has settled charges of violating provisions of insider trading, the country's markets regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 数据显示，亚洲并购费用降至11年新低，原因是交易进展缓慢
item.description: 2024 年上半年，亚洲企业并购所产生的财务咨询费用降至 11 年来最低水平，在已宣布和已完成交易均减少的情况下，几乎没有迅速反弹的迹象。【原文：Financial advisory fees from mergers and acquisitions in Asia dropped to the lowest levels in 11 years in the first half of 2024, with little signs of a quick rebound amid declines in both announced and completed deals.】

item.title: 将稀土从矿山转化为磁铁的复杂性
item.description: 欧盟将努力实现新立法中关于稀土的宏伟目标，该立法旨在提高国内关键矿物的产量，减少对中国的依赖。【原文：The EU will struggle to meet ambitious goals for rare earths in new legislation designed to boost domestic output of critical minerals and reduce dependence on China.】

item.title: 洞察：在重拾稀土荣耀的竞赛中，欧洲在矿产目标方面存在不足
item.description: 四十年前，法国大西洋沿岸的一家稀土加工厂是世界上最大的稀土加工厂之一，生产用于制造彩色电视机、弧光灯和照相机镜头的材料。【原文：Four decades ago, a rare earth processing plant on France's Atlantic coast was one of the largest in the world, churning out materials used to make colour televisions, arc lights and camera lenses.】

item.title: 企业在欧盟打造稀土产业
item.description: 在稀土领域，欧盟将努力实现其新立法中的大部分宏伟目标，这些立法旨在提高国内关键矿物的产量，减少对中国的依赖。【原文：In the rare earths sector, the EU will struggle to meet most of its ambitious goals in new legislation designed to boost domestic output of critical minerals and reduce dependence on China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，腾讯支持的 Shift Up 或将以区间上限定价上市
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，由中国腾讯公司支持的韩国游戏公司 Shift Up 将把首次公开募股的价格定在其价格区间的上限，并筹集 4,350 亿韩元（约合 3.13 亿美元）的资金。【原文：South Korean gaming company Shift Up, backed by China's Tencent , is set to price its initial public offering at the top end of its price band and raise 435 billion won ($313 million), according to a source with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 三菱重工高管：决定进军客机市场的时机尚未成熟
item.description: 三菱重工的一位高管周四表示，尽管政府致力于日本制造的飞机，但在 SpaceJet 失败之后，现在还不是决定是否重新进入商用飞机市场的时候。【原文：A Mitsubishi Heavy Industries executive said Thursday that despite the government's commitment to made-in-Japan aircraft, now is not the time to decide whether to re-enter the commercial airplane market, after the failure of the SpaceJet.】

item.title: 西捷航空在接到罢工通知后开始取消航班
item.description: 加拿大西捷航空公司（WestJet Airlines）周三表示，在代表该公司维修工程师的工会拒绝了新的薪酬提议并发出第二次罢工通知后，该公司已开始取消航班。【原文：Canada's WestJet Airlines has begun cancelling flights after a union representing its maintenance engineers rejected its new pay offer and served a second strike notice, the carrier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下跌，日元暴跌令市场保持干预警惕
item.description: 周四，由于对通胀的担忧，亚洲股市下跌，债券收益率飙升，而日元汇率跌破160美元兑1美元，货币交易员担心日本会出手稳定日元汇率。【原文：Asian shares fell and bond yields spiked on nervousness about inflation on Thursday, while the yen's slide past 160-per-dollar had currency traders bracing for Japan to step in and steady it.】

item.title: LME 所有者香港交易所表示，LME 将香港视为全球仓库所在地
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（LME）所有者的首席执行官周四表示，该交易所正在探讨将香港列为 LME 仓库所在地的可能性，因为该交易所希望加强其全球物流布局。【原文：The London Metal Exchange (LME) is exploring the possibility of listing Hong Kong as an LME warehouse location, the chief executive of its owner said on Thursday, as the exchange looks to strengthen its global logistics footprint.】

item.title: 中国将对进口欧盟甲苯胺的反倾销措施进行复审
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国将对进口欧盟用于染料、医药和农药的甲苯胺的反倾销措施进行期满复审。【原文：China's Ministry of Commerce said on Thursday that China would initiate an expiry review of anti-dumping measures on imports of European Union toluidine, used for dye, pharmaceuticals and pesticides.】

item.title: Birkenstock 为 L Catterton 实体的二次发行定价为 54 美元/股
item.description: 德国凉鞋制造商 Birkenstock 周三表示，该公司已将 L Catterton 关联实体的 7.56 亿美元二次发行定价为每股 54 美元。【原文：German sandal maker Birkenstock said on Wednesday it has priced a $756 million secondary offering by an entity affiliated with L Catterton at $54 apiece.】

item.title: 库存意外增加，担心美国需求放缓，油价下滑
item.description: 油价周四在亚洲早盘交易中下滑，原因是美国库存意外增加，加剧了人们对第一大石油消费国需求放缓的担忧，尽管人们担心加沙战争的潜在扩大可能会扰乱中东的供应，但还是抑制了油价的跌幅。【原文：Oil prices slid in early Asian trade on Thursday as a surprise build in U.S. stockpiles fuelled fears about slow demand from the top oil consumer, though worries a potential expansion of the Gaza war may disrupt Middle East supplies capped declines.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，日元受挫逼近数十年低点
item.description: 周四，日元在38年低点附近徘徊，在1美元兑160日元的疲软水平上挣扎，使市场警惕日本当局为支撑货币而进行干预的任何迹象。【原文：The yen languished near a 38-year low on Thursday and struggled on the weaker side of 160 per dollar, keeping markets on alert for any signs of intervention from Japanese authorities to prop up the currency.】

item.title: 日本 5 月零售额同比增长 3.0%，超出预期
item.description: 日本政府周四公布的数据显示，日本 5 月份零售额同比增长 3.0%。【原文：Japanese retail sales rose 3.0% in May from a year earlier, government data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院宣布美国证券交易委员会撤销代理投票建议规则
item.description: 一家联邦上诉法院周三驳回了美国证券交易委员会 2022 年废除的部分规则，批评者称这些规则妨碍了就如何在公司选举中投票向投资者提供建议的公司的独立性。【原文：A federal appeals court on Wednesday struck down part of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's 2022 rescission of rules that critics said impeded the independence of firms that advise investors on how to vote in corporate elections.】
